Question
========
Which statement best describes the relationship between deep learning and AI in this unit?

Answerlist
----------
* Deep learning is unrelated to AI.
* Deep learning is a subset of AI that uses multi-layer neural networks.
* AI is a subset of deep learning.
* Deep learning only refers to non-neural network models.

Solution
========
Deep learning is described as a subset of AI centered on multi-layer neural networks.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
